channel.title: Cache problem
channel.description:
hi i am currently making my client into a webclient and for some reason when it is done downloading cache the only thing in the cache folder is this: [img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/1751/110114221037.png[/img]
and this error in the client run cmd: [code=java]Tainted-pkz Client Taintedpkz.zip 66674078 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:219) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:176) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:8135) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:67) at client.startUp(client.java:8136) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:66) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4325) at client.startUp(client.java:8146) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
it seems that the client is not unzipping the cache
if anyone could please help me i would very much appreciate it

item.title: Cache problem
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

hi i am currently making my client into a webclient and for some reason when it is done downloading cache the only thing in the cache folder is this:

and this error in the client run cmd:

Tainted-pkz Client Taintedpkz.zip 66674078 java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:219) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:176) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:8135) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:67) at client.startUp(client.java:8136) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Taintedpkz\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at Update.unZipFile(Update.java:66) at Update.<init>(Update.java:29) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4325) at client.startUp(client.java:8146) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5583) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

it seems that the client is not unzipping the cache

if anyone could please help me i would very much appreciate it
